What Makes Me.....Me

I AM DAVID S QUEEN JR. formerly of NJ, now a resident of Atlanta GA. I have been many things in my journey; a toll collector, landscaper, bus driver, but they have all been mere stops along the way to becoming what I was meant to be: A PROGRAMMER.

My Skills

My Life

My first taste of my dream was in high school when I took a course in C++, and from there I was hooked. I loved the feeling of finding the most efficient way to solve a problem using nothing more than the logical deduction and the tools that I had. From there I began teaching myself Python, C#, HTML, PHP, then finally JavaScript.

Have you ever seen me and BATMAN in the same room at the same time? ....just saying.
-me
